product_name: Native Eyewear Andes Reflex Polarized Sunglasses
long_description: Eyewear protection for year-round use with added glare protection, the Native Andes Reflex polarized sunglasses feature interchangeable lenses to protect you eyes from the elements anytime of the day. Each frame includes 1 set of polarized lens and 1 set of SportFlex(TM) lenses, for a total of 2 sets of lenses. Interchangeable lens system lets you switch lenses to accommodate a variety of light conditions and activities. N3(TM) polarized lenses block 40% of infrared light (decreasing eye fatigue), offer UV protection and blue light filtering to minimize haze and enhance clarity. Lenses are built to withstand a high-velocity impact. Moss/Asphalt frames feature polarized Bronze (brown tint) Reflex lenses that work well in extremely bright sunlight; Reflex- lenses provide increased glare reduction. Asphalt/Iron frames feature polarized Blue (gray tint) Reflex lenses that work well in extremely bright sunlight; Reflex lenses provide increased glare reduction. Frames endure extreme highs and lows in temperature. Frames are extremely lightweight, yet flexible and durable enough to withstand high velocity collisions. Self-adjusting Cushinol(TM) nosepads and ear stems create a nonslip grip that keeps sunglasses in place, ensuring a soft feel and personalized fit. Temple ends hug behind your ears to keep sunglasses in place. Cam-action spring hinges quickly lock temples into position. Additional SportFlex orange-yellow lenses have a mirror coating suitable for a range of low lighting-cloudy, overcast, dusk and dawn. Native Andes interchangeable polarized sunglasses include a protective case and a soft pouch that doubles as a cleaning cloth. Frames best fit medium profiles.
short_description: Eyewear protection for year-round use with added glare protection, the Native Andes Reflex polarized sunglasses feature interchangeable lenses to protect you eyes from the elements anytime of the day.
